snippet: The state plans to use its electric chair on Wednesday to execute a man who pleaded guilty to two prison murders and threatened to continue killing until he was executed.
abstract: Virginia plans to use its electric chair for the first time in nearly three years to execute confessed murderer Robert Charles Gleason Jr; Gleason had pledged to continue killing unless he was executed.
lead_paragraph: The state plans to use its electric chair on Wednesday to execute a man who pleaded guilty to two prison murders and threatened to continue killing until he was executed.

headline.main: Virginia: Man Vowing to Kill More Faces Execution
